question: The proposed Kavali nuclear power plant in Andhra Pradesh will be constructed in collaboration with which country?
explanation: Kavali is a proposed nuclear power project in the South Coastal Andhra Pradesh. The site is located on the border of Prakasham and Nellore districts for building the nuclear power plant in collaboration with Russia. Beside Kavali, Kovvada is another proposed nuclear plant in Andhra Pradesh. While Kovvada is located in Srikakulam district in north coastal Andhra, Kavali is in south coastal Andhra.
